title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Atelectasis
code: dat.atelectasis <- escalc(measure="RR",               ai=c(3, 2, 1, 1, 0),               bi=c(15, 33, 43, 44, 15),               ci=c(4, 6, 4, 2, 1),               di=c(15, 29, 38, 43, 14),               slab=c("Boules et al, 2011",                      "Mahmoud et al, 2017",                      "Li et al (Standard), 2020",                      "Li et al (OLA), 2020",                      "Ammar et al, 2021")               )

title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Atelectasis
code: fe <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat.atelectasis, method="FE")  forest(fe,         atransf=exp,        at=log(c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 4, 10)))

title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Atelectasis
code: re <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat.atelectasis, method="REML")  forest(re,        atransf=exp,        at=log(c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 4, 10))) re #>  #> Random-Effects Model (k = 5; tau^2 estimator: REML) #>  #> tau^2 (estimated amount of total heterogeneity): 0 (SE = 0.6048) #> tau (square root of estimated tau^2 value):      0 #> I^2 (total heterogeneity / total variability):   0.00% #> H^2 (total variability / sampling variability):  1.00 #>  #> Test for Heterogeneity: #> Q(df = 4) = 1.1940, p-val = 0.8791 #>  #> Model Results: #>  #> estimate      se     zval    pval    ci.lb   ci.ub   ​  #>  -0.7766  0.4205  -1.8471  0.0647  -1.6007  0.0475  .  #>  #> --- #> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Atelectasis
code: pm <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat.atelectasis, method="PM")  forest(pm,        atransf=exp,        at=log(c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 4, 10))) pm #>  #> Random-Effects Model (k = 5; tau^2 estimator: PM) #>  #> tau^2 (estimated amount of total heterogeneity): 0 (SE = 0.6250) #> tau (square root of estimated tau^2 value):      0 #> I^2 (total heterogeneity / total variability):   0.00% #> H^2 (total variability / sampling variability):  1.00 #>  #> Test for Heterogeneity: #> Q(df = 4) = 1.1940, p-val = 0.8791 #>  #> Model Results: #>  #> estimate      se     zval    pval    ci.lb   ci.ub   ​  #>  -0.7766  0.4205  -1.8471  0.0647  -1.6007  0.0475  .  #>  #> --- #> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Atelectasis
code: pmhk <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat.atelectasis, method="PM", test="knha")  forest(pmhk,        atransf=exp,        at=log(c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 4, 10)))

title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Atelectasis
code: dat.atelectasis.OR <- escalc(measure="OR",               ai=c(3, 2, 1, 1, 0),               bi=c(15, 33, 43, 44, 15),               ci=c(4, 6, 4, 2, 1),               di=c(15, 29, 38, 43, 14),               slab=c("Boules et al, 2011",                      "Mahmoud et al, 2017",                      "Li et al (Standard), 2020",                      "Li et al (OLA), 2020",                      "Ammar et al, 2021")               ) pm.OR <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat.atelectasis.OR, method="PM")  forest(pm.OR,        atransf=exp,        at=log(c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 4, 10))) pm.OR #>  #> Random-Effects Model (k = 5; tau^2 estimator: PM) #>  #> tau^2 (estimated amount of total heterogeneity): 0 (SE = 0.7794) #> tau (square root of estimated tau^2 value):      0 #> I^2 (total heterogeneity / total variability):   0.00% #> H^2 (total variability / sampling variability):  1.00 #>  #> Test for Heterogeneity: #> Q(df = 4) = 1.0030, p-val = 0.9093 #>  #> Model Results: #>  #> estimate      se     zval    pval    ci.lb   ci.ub   ​  #>  -0.9086  0.4695  -1.9351  0.0530  -1.8288  0.0117  .  #>  #> --- #> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 pmhk.OR <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat.atelectasis.OR, method="PM", test="knha")  forest(pmhk.OR,        atransf=exp,        at=log(c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 4, 10))) pmhk #>  #> Random-Effects Model (k = 5; tau^2 estimator: PM) #>  #> tau^2 (estimated amount of total heterogeneity): 0 (SE = 0.6250) #> tau (square root of estimated tau^2 value):      0 #> I^2 (total heterogeneity / total variability):   0.00% #> H^2 (total variability / sampling variability):  1.00 #>  #> Test for Heterogeneity: #> Q(df = 4) = 1.1940, p-val = 0.8791 #>  #> Model Results: #>  #> estimate      se     tval  df    pval    ci.lb    ci.ub   ​  #>  -0.7766  0.2297  -3.3808   4  0.0278  -1.4144  -0.1388  *  #>  #> --- #> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Pneumonia
code: dat <- escalc(measure="RR",               ai=c(3, 5, 2, 0, 1),               bi=c(32, 39, 43, 15, 24),               ci=c(6, 7, 4, 1, 2),               di=c(29, 35, 41, 14, 23),               slab=c("Mahmoud et al, 2017",                      "Li et al (Standard), 2020",                      "Li et al (OLA), 2020",                      "Ammar et al, 2021",                      "Yao et al, 2020"))

title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Pneumonia
code: fe <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat, method="FE")  forest(fe,         atransf=exp,        at=log(c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 4, 10)))

title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Pneumonia
code: re <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat, method="REML")  forest(re,        atransf=exp,        at=log(c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 4, 10))) re #>  #> Random-Effects Model (k = 5; tau^2 estimator: REML) #>  #> tau^2 (estimated amount of total heterogeneity): 0 (SE = 0.4151) #> tau (square root of estimated tau^2 value):      0 #> I^2 (total heterogeneity / total variability):   0.00% #> H^2 (total variability / sampling variability):  1.00 #>  #> Test for Heterogeneity: #> Q(df = 4) = 0.2927, p-val = 0.9903 #>  #> Model Results: #>  #> estimate      se     zval    pval    ci.lb   ci.ub   ​  #>  -0.5843  0.3503  -1.6677  0.0954  -1.2709  0.1024  .  #>  #> --- #> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Pneumonia
code: pm <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat, method="PM")  forest(pm,        atransf=exp,        at=log(c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 4, 10))) pm #>  #> Random-Effects Model (k = 5; tau^2 estimator: PM) #>  #> tau^2 (estimated amount of total heterogeneity): 0 (SE = 0.4339) #> tau (square root of estimated tau^2 value):      0 #> I^2 (total heterogeneity / total variability):   0.00% #> H^2 (total variability / sampling variability):  1.00 #>  #> Test for Heterogeneity: #> Q(df = 4) = 0.2927, p-val = 0.9903 #>  #> Model Results: #>  #> estimate      se     zval    pval    ci.lb   ci.ub   ​  #>  -0.5843  0.3503  -1.6677  0.0954  -1.2709  0.1024  .  #>  #> --- #> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Pneumonia
code: pmhk <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat, method="PM", test="knha")  forest(pmhk,        atransf=exp,        at=log(c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 4, 10))) pmhk #>  #> Random-Effects Model (k = 5; tau^2 estimator: PM) #>  #> tau^2 (estimated amount of total heterogeneity): 0 (SE = 0.4339) #> tau (square root of estimated tau^2 value):      0 #> I^2 (total heterogeneity / total variability):   0.00% #> H^2 (total variability / sampling variability):  1.00 #>  #> Test for Heterogeneity: #> Q(df = 4) = 0.2927, p-val = 0.9903 #>  #> Model Results: #>  #> estimate      se     tval  df    pval    ci.lb    ci.ub    ​  #>  -0.5843  0.0948  -6.1650   4  0.0035  -0.8474  -0.3211  **  #>  #> --- #> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

title: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Pneumonia
code: dat.OR <- escalc(measure="OR",               ai=c(3, 5, 2, 0, 1),               bi=c(32, 39, 43, 15, 24),               ci=c(6, 7, 4, 1, 2),               di=c(29, 35, 41, 14, 23),               slab=c("Mahmoud et al, 2017",                      "Li et al (Standard), 2020",                      "Li et al (OLA), 2020",                      "Ammar et al, 2021",                      "Yao et al, 2020")) pm.OR <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat.OR, method="PM")  forest(pm.OR,        atransf=exp,        at=log(c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 4, 10))) pm.OR #>  #> Random-Effects Model (k = 5; tau^2 estimator: PM) #>  #> tau^2 (estimated amount of total heterogeneity): 0 (SE = 0.5416) #> tau (square root of estimated tau^2 value):      0 #> I^2 (total heterogeneity / total variability):   0.00% #> H^2 (total variability / sampling variability):  1.00 #>  #> Test for Heterogeneity: #> Q(df = 4) = 0.2503, p-val = 0.9928 #>  #> Model Results: #>  #> estimate      se     zval    pval    ci.lb   ci.ub   ​  #>  -0.6630  0.3914  -1.6940  0.0903  -1.4302  0.1041  .  #>  #> --- #> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 pmhk.OR <- rma(yi, vi, data=dat.OR, method="PM", test="knha")  forest(pmhk.OR,        atransf=exp,        at=log(c(0.01, 0.1, 0.5, 1, 4, 10))) pmhk #>  #> Random-Effects Model (k = 5; tau^2 estimator: PM) #>  #> tau^2 (estimated amount of total heterogeneity): 0 (SE = 0.4339) #> tau (square root of estimated tau^2 value):      0 #> I^2 (total heterogeneity / total variability):   0.00% #> H^2 (total variability / sampling variability):  1.00 #>  #> Test for Heterogeneity: #> Q(df = 4) = 0.2927, p-val = 0.9903 #>  #> Model Results: #>  #> estimate      se     tval  df    pval    ci.lb    ci.ub    ​  #>  -0.5843  0.0948  -6.1650   4  0.0035  -0.8474  -0.3211  **  #>  #> --- #> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1

title: Authors and Citation
text: Law M (2022). dcv: Meta-Analysis Postoperative Pneumonia. R package version 0.0.0.9000, https://martinlaw.github.io/dcv/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {dcv: Meta-Analysis on Postoperative Pneumonia},   author = {Martin Law},   year = {2022},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://martinlaw.github.io/dcv/}, }
